page.title: 01CITY OF SALISBURY
page.content: SITE- Meeting point of four rivers, seven mainroads and four railway lines POPULATION- 37,000 OPEN MARKET- Tuesday and Saturday CATTLE MARKET- Monday,Tuesday & Friday ANTIQUES MARKET- Tuesday ANNUAL FAIR- Three days in October ANNUAL NUMBER OF TOURISTS- 3,000,000 UNEMPLOYED- June 1985 8.6% MAIN EMPLOYMENT- Services; Lt Industry {INTERESTING FACT-}In 1974 The Charter Trustees who protect our charter & civic traditions, unusually kept the role of Mayor as well as that of Chairman of the new district Council. {DOMESDAY 1086 AND SALISBURY} Osmund,Bishop of Old Sarum, whose tomb is in the Cathedral, was one of the Original Domesday Commissioners. It is alleged that William 1 received the completed Domesday Book at Old Sarum.
